item.name: Webhooks
item.description: fabric **Webhooks** API send real-time notifications to the target URL when a subscribed event occurs at source. fabric's Webhooks API, for multi-tenant service, let merchants subscribe to [various events](https://developer.fabric.inc/reference/oms-developer-guide-webhook-events) of fabric Orders (also called OMS). When the subscribed event occurs at source (fabric Orders), fabric sends a notification to the configured target URL.

description.content: Get all webhook definitions for the given tenantId, offset, and limit.

fabric **Webhooks** API send real-time notifications to the target URL when a subscribed event occurs at source. fabric's Webhooks API, for multi-tenant service, let merchants subscribe to [various events](https://developer.fabric.inc/reference/oms-developer-guide-webhook-events) of fabric Orders (also called OMS). When the subscribed event occurs at source (fabric Orders), fabric sends a notification to the configured target URL.
